Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Class BaseController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.ControllerGuiInterface
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.BaseController
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseMeController
public class BaseController
extends ControllerGuiInterface
Controller of the generic base scene, show a the Player Board with all the info updates about the player
